ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The authors thank B. Choi and H. Jung for the help of planting and harvesting plants, and J. Seo and J. Lee for their comments on the plant growth. This work is supported by Korea National Arboretum (Project No. KNA1‐2‐26, 16‐4) and GIST Research Institute (GRI) grant funded by the GIST in 2020.
